title: Germany debates coronavirus vaccine mandate, pushes new measures that target unvaccinated
content:
1. Germany debates coronavirus vaccine mandate, pushes new measures that target unvaccinated  The Washington Post
  2. Germany locks down unvaccinated people, as leaders plan to make shots compulsory  CNN
  3. Germany steps closer to making Covid vaccines mandatory, imposes strict curbs on unvaccinated  CNBC
  4. Like Angela Merkel, I’d back mandatory Covid vaccinations  The Independent
  5. German government says Covid vaccination may be made compulsory - BBC News  BBC News
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
contentSnippet:
Germany debates coronavirus vaccine mandate, pushes new measures that target unvaccinated  The Washington Post
Germany locks down unvaccinated people, as leaders plan to make shots compulsory  CNN
Germany steps closer to making Covid vaccines mandatory, imposes strict curbs on unvaccinated  CNBC
Like Angela Merkel, I’d back mandatory Covid vaccinations  The Independent
German government says Covid vaccination may be made compulsory - BBC News  BBC News

localize.title: ドイツ、コロナウイルスのワクチン接種義務化を議論、未接種者を対象とした新たな対策を推し進める
德国就冠状病毒疫苗任务进行辩论，推动针对未接种疫苗的新措施
